SELECT ROUT_ID ,REP_ROUT_ID ,REP_ROUT_NM ,ROUT_NM ,ROUT_LEN FROM BMS_ROUT_MST WHERE DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY REP_ROUT_NM, ROUT_ID

SELECT A.ERROR_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.VHC_ID ,B.VHC_NO FROM BRT_DVC_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST B ON A.VHC_ID = B.VHC_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} GROUP BY A.ROUT_ID, A.VHC_ID ORDER BY A.VHC_ID

SELECT a.VHC_ID , a.VHC_NO , b.DVC_ID , b.DVC_KIND , c.DVC_COND FROM BMS_VHC_MST a LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO b ON a.VHC_ID = b.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_COND_INFO c ON b.MNG_ID = c.MNG_ID
a.VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || a.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
a.VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
a.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY a.VHC_ID, b.DVC_KIND ORDER BY a.VHC_ID
